Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: I'll make you eat those words.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say Ganondorf knows where to find the instrument of his doom.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: There's a reason why I am special inquisitor!

GC (Maze).text: I heard @ isn't very good at Zelda.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

HC (Malon).text: They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: The single rupee is a unique item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

HF (Open Grotto).text: 'Member when Ganon was a blue pig?^I 'member.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Here's a hint, @. Don't be bad.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

LH (Lab).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the real Phantom Ganon is bright and loud.

LW (Bridge).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that you're wasting time reading this hint, but I disagree. Talk to me again!

ToT (Left).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

ZD (Mweep).text: You're playing a Randomizer. I'm randomized!^Here's a random number:  #4#.&Enjoy your Randomizer!

ZF (Fairy).text: I'm a helpful hint Gossip Stone!^See, I'm helping.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

ZR (Near Domain).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that walking backwards is very fast.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.
